file_insights.build-progress.txt: Updated to reflect completion of subtask 1.4, marking Phase 1 as completed with 4/4 subtasks finished
file_insights.implementation_plan.json: Updated subtask 1.4 status from 'pending' to 'completed' with detailed notes about the HTML fixtures created
file_insights.code_blocks.html: 373-line comprehensive fixture showcasing 10+ programming languages with syntax highlighting classes
file_insights.encoding_latin1.html: 297-line fixture testing Latin-1 encoding with Western European characters (German, French, Spanish, Italian)
file_insights.encoding_utf8.html: 239-line fixture with UTF-8 encoding and 15+ languages/scripts
file_insights.malformed.html: 327-line fixture with 20+ malformed HTML edge cases

patterns_discovered.file_organization: HTML fixtures follow a consistent naming convention and are organized in tests/testdata/fixtures/html/ directory
patterns_discovered.content_diversity: Fixtures cover multiple categories: SPA patterns, table structures, code blocks, navigation, malformed HTML, and encoding variations
patterns_discovered.test_coverage: Fixtures specifically designed to test converter pipeline components: sanitization, readability, markdown conversion, encoding normalization
patterns_discovered.file_structure: Each HTML file follows semantic HTML5 structure with proper doctype, head, and body sections

gotchas_discovered.encoding_handling: Different encoding files (Latin-1 vs UTF-8) test the converter's ability to handle character encoding variations
gotchas_discovered.malformed_html: Special handling needed for edge cases like unclosed tags, nested block elements, and malformed attributes
gotchas_discovered.code_block_variety: Need to support multiple programming languages with syntax highlighting classes (language-* patterns)
gotchas_discovered.spa_patterns: Single-page applications require special handling for client-side routing and dynamic content patterns

approach_outcome.comprehensive_fixture_creation: Successfully created 7 HTML fixtures totaling 1,823 lines covering all required categories
approach_outcome.test_support: Fixtures specifically designed to support converter pipeline testing with realistic, production-like HTML content
approach_outcome.edge_case_coverage: Malformed HTML fixture includes 20+ edge cases to test robustness of HTML parsing and sanitization
approach_outcome.encoding_testing: Separate fixtures for Latin-1 and UTF-8 encoding to test internationalization support

recommendations.fixture_maintenance: Consider creating a test utility to verify fixture completeness and consistency
recommendations.additional_categories: Explore adding fixtures for forms and audio/video content if not already covered
recommendations.benchmarking: Consider using these fixtures for performance benchmarking of the converter pipeline
recommendations.documentation: Document the fixture coverage matrix showing which HTML features each fixture tests
